description: a(n+1) = nextprime(a(n)^2). Smallest prime following the square of previous prime. Initial value = 2.
links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..12
Kaisa Matom√§ki, Prime-representing functions, Acta Math. Hungar. 128 (2010), pp. 307-314.
mathematica: p=2; lst={p}; Do[p=NextPrime[p*p]; AppendTo[lst,p], {n,8}]; lst [_Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, May 27 2009]
author: _Labos Elemer_, Feb 22 2001
extensions: Changed offset to 1 to parallel other such sequences. - _Robert G. Wilson v_, Nov 15 2012
